text: فَٰكِهِينَ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ وَوَقَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

translation.en: Enjoying what their Lord has given them, and their Lord protected them from the punishment of Hellfire
translation.id: mereka bersuka ria dengan apa yang diberikan Tuhan kepada mereka; dan Tuhan memelihara mereka dari azab neraka
